name: react-time-select
description: Component to generate a dropdown list populated with a configurable time range

scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run coverage
scripts.coverage: babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --require react-tests-globals-setup test/test* && istanbul check-coverage
scripts.prepublish: mkdir -p dist && babel src/TimeSelect.jsx > dist/TimeSelect.js && babel src/HourInput.jsx > dist/HourInput.js && babel src/MinuteInput.jsx > dist/MinuteInput.js && babel src/TimeInput.jsx > dist/TimeInput.js

author: Ollie Buck <ollie.buck@holidayextras.com>
